name: Personal Space (Shepherd Cameron)
description:
Personal Space is a Global Game Jam project, made in only 72 hours.

The game is 4 players.

The goal of the game is to invade the other players' personal space without touching them. Wiggle your body to come close to your opponents to gain points. Be cautious, however, if you touch an opponent you'll lose points.

Credits:

Lead Programmer Sean Braithwaite

Project Manager & Assistant Artist Shepherd Cameron

Lead & Concept Artist Vivian Ha

2D production Artist Keita Lorente

Programmer & Composer Nathan Powless-Lynes
